title: When will Riot sell Zed and Riven Championship
body:
Championship Zed and Riven has been in the store for nearly 2 patches,but Riot still doesn't release them yet,i can't wait,can somebody tell me when will Riot releases them,it's too long
Sorry for my English :p

replies.body: i dont get it, its clearly happening during the worlds that is when all the other skins return. why are you guys allowed to just say the same thing, we all know that you know exactly when it comes out
Unfortunately, I have no details on new or upcoming content.  Stay up to dat through our [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page for any news on that.  Hang in there!
